seo.title: Riomaggiore Beaches 2025 | Swimming Spots & Rocky Coves
seo.description: Discover Riomaggiore's rocky beaches and swimming spots. From the harbor swimming area to hidden coves, find the best places for a Mediterranean dip.

body.title: Rocky Coves & Harbor Swimming
body.subtitle: Dive into crystal-clear Mediterranean waters from rocky platforms and small coves. Authentic seaside experience without sandy beaches.

features.title: Harbor Swimming Area
features.description: Small rocky beach and swimming platforms next to the marina, easy access with local atmosphere

features.title: Rocky Platforms
features.description: Flat rocks perfect for sunbathing and diving into deep, clear Mediterranean waters

features.title: Hidden Coves
features.description: Small secluded spots accessible via short walks or scrambles along the rocky coastline

features.title: Locals' Favorite Spots
features.description: Ask locals for secret swimming holes away from the main harbor area

features.title: Afternoon Sun
features.description: Best swimming in afternoon when sun illuminates the harbor and water is warmest

features.title: Snorkeling
features.description: Bring a mask to observe Mediterranean fish and marine life in the clear rocky waters

body.title: More Water Activities
body.description: Explore the coastline from a different perspective with boat tours and excursions.
